vsParam:
Yeah, sure! I'm great!
What brings you here, all of you?
Nothing much, I just want to... visit my dear father... hmm!
Idiot! How can you chicken out now!

Mr. Scalcap. I think Varerian has something to tell you.
Can you please listen to him?

Huh? Something to tell me?
So serious, go ahead. I'm listening.

Father...
Would you like to taste my cuisines?

Cuisines?
Gee, I have tasted them a thousand times!

That's not what I meant.
To be honest, I want to be a chef!

Although I haven't repaid all your love and kindness for me,
I don't want to give up this dream that I worked so hard to find!

So please! Please taste my cuisines!
I want you to approve of my dream!

Mr. Scalcap, Varerian is serious this time.
He's been cooking for students in the Academy.

Yeah! His cuisines are super popular!
So—

... I see. Let me try it.
Varerian, show me your... resolution.

Uh~~! Varerian's cuisines are so good!
I can gulp all of them.

Father, what do you think? Better than what I made earlier, right?
After spending time with them, I—

What's the matter with you?
Did you become a loser after going to the Academy?

Stop joking!
Are you saying that my cuisines are terrible?

I didn't say terrible,
I said no.

What do you mean...
I can't understand!

Hey...
Aren't you going to chase that moron?

No reason.
I can't approve of his dream. That's it.

How to put it...
It's just ordinary.

That guy doesn't know anything.
He needs... you right now, [px].

I'm making a request to you as a father.
Please help him.

Alright. We'll come back.
And you'll approve of him next time!
